mapper.sql: ID, ENTRYINFO, RAWCHECK, AMOUNT, STANDARD_, WEIGHT, LOCATION_
mapper.insert: insert into RAWENTRYDETAIL (ID, ENTRYINFO, RAWCHECK, AMOUNT, STANDARD_, WEIGHT, LOCATION_) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{entryinfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rawcheck,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update RAWENTRYDETAIL set ENTRYINFO = #{entryinfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RAWCHECK = #{rawcheck,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, STANDARD_ = #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION_ = #{location,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
